compactcrafting.jei.miniaturization.cata: Throw this item into the miniaturization field to start crafting.
tooltip.compactcrafting.proxy_hint: Send a redstone pulse to mark a field for recipe scanning.
tooltip.compactcrafting.proxy_bind_hint: Shift-use on a projector to bind to a field.
tooltip.compactcrafting.proxy_unbind_hin: Shift-use in the air to unbind from field.
